title: Hammer
description: Made of Texas mesquite and stainless steel. Required tool for any project.

title: Drill
description: Manufactured during the 1950s, these non-cordless drills are proven to last a lifetime.

title: Mower
description: Energy and gas-efficient, our mowers will manicure your lawn with care.

title: Screwdrivers
description: Cherry handle with zebrawood inlay and carbon-alloy tipped, our screwdrivers come with a lifetime warranty. Phillips and Flathead available.
